title: Deadly attack on military base in southeast Niger: sources
text:
Niamey (AFP) – Armed men launched a deadly attack overnight against a military base in southeastern Niger’s Diffa region, which has been a target of Boko Haram jihadists, local sources said Wednesday.

“The Blabrine military unit was targeted last night. The situation is ongoing,” a municipal source told AFP on condition of anonymity, adding that 10 people had been killed.

A senior official in Diffa, where the Blabrine base is located, confirmed the attack, saying: “There have been deaths and military equipment has been torched.”
